acceptance-test-run.title: When the @Size annotation doesn't have a max length specified, Podam should assign a sensible value
acceptance-test-run.name: whenMaxLengthIsNotSpecifiedInSizeAnnotationPodamShouldAssignASensibleDefault

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ValidationPojoForStringWithSizeAndNoMax
Then the Object should not be null
Then the POJO should not have any Validator violations
